content:
SaveOptions Enum

Definition

Specifies the behavior of the object context when the stem.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges(System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions) method is called.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum SaveOptions
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SaveOptions

Fields

AcceptAllChangesAfterSave

After changes are saved, the stem.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave* method is called, which resets change tracking in the ObjectStateManager.
DetectChangesBeforeSave

Before changes are saved, the stem.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges* method is called to synchronize the property values of objects that are attached to the object context with data in the ObjectStateManager.
None

Changes are saved without the stem.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges* or the stem.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave* methods being called.
